reviews.sentence: New Hotel in Chicago. I felt that everyone really tried to be helpful. Check in was delayed it took Expedia over 60 minutes to send the reservation over as we waited in the lobby the support also sucked 30 minutes on the phone and no one ever answered. After that it was a very nice stay. The staff is really friendly and helpful. The location the cleanliness the restaurant the staff. The price was high the day we checked in.

Perfect Park and Fly. For the price of parking at Midway and about 75 we got to stay in a clean up to date hotel. Exceptionally nice front desk clerk Sarah and very surprisingly good cheeseburger from room service at 10 PM. As my wife characterized it a great pre vacation vacation.

Tried to get a room. Flight was delayed by 8 hours we had paid to park on the property of this hotel so after our return from the airport we went to holiday inn. We asked for a half day rate to rest until our flight was to leave and were told they did not offer this. After eating an awful breakfast in their restaurant coaches we sat in the lobby and my brother in law started to doze off. We were approached by an employee telling us that we could get a half day rate for 100 or we had to leave. This was denied to us several hours earlier and we now had less than 2 hrs to wait for our flight. Tried to notify management unsuccessfully because we were then childishly ignored and lied to about the situation that occured.
Short Stay. Decent Hotel. Clean rooms. Polite Staff. Did not run into major issues. Little bit pricey for the quality. Close to the airport. But no easy public transport to get to the hotel.

Check the price with the hotel first. Great location to stay if you are flying out of Midway they made a good attempt to cancel out the noise from inside the hotel and the staff were friendlyThe bar staff were fantastic we gave one of the staff free run to create some drinks Esmerelda was her name. and she made some absolutely amazing drinks. I was charged more than bokingcom said I would be. I was told that it would be 209 and I was charged 280 after taxes I was never informed there was a 25 per night fee that I would get back if the room was left in a good state.

Clean rooms ample free parking 3 10 minute drive from Midway depending on traffic. there is also an open room next to the front desk that has sundries and you pay at the front desk so it is always open.
Exceptional. Met our needs. A little pricey to not include brakfast.

Worst hotel experience I have ever had. I had booked a reservation for my dad due to his flight being cancelled for the day. The airline gave a coupon ticket for a room. When I called reservations they told me the price would be 162tax and they will take the discount off that price when he got there with the coupon. They ended up charging him 190. When I called I got 3 different stories. About what they price was. And then the last person told me I would be charged for a free shuttle to the airport. We went back and forth and they only thing they could say was I am sorry. This is the rate. So they liked to me so I would book with them and then pretty much said too bad that is our price. I will never book with them again. I have never in my life received this kind of service from any hotels I have ever booked with. They said someone will contact you within 24 hours. I have yet to see that happen.

They are remodeling and their rooms look fantastic. Honestly make you feel like you are in a more expensive room downtown. The bar restaurant is suitable for a typical stay and the whole place is clean.

Nice property great value and location. We spent the night here even though we came for the Chicago Theater. We did hire a taxi to and from but even spending nearly 100 on the rides it was cheaper than staying downtown the hotel prices there are out of control. This property is very well maintained and clean quiet and has great service. It is very convenient if you are flying but not bad if you are doing stuff downtown too. Driving in Chicago is a drag any way you look at it but I do recommend this property.

It was a nice place to stay but would never pay that much to stay there again. It was a pretty motel. It was clean. There was no complimentary breakfast. When you pay over 200 a night for a motel you would expect free breakfast in the morning. This was a deal breaker.
Great hotel for the price phone call attendance could be improved.
